response.overview: In a disintegrating landscape of immortal life, "Princess" follows the main character, Xana. As he struggles to recall his memory in order. An old tape machine becomes both a tool and an obsolete artifact, capturing the protagonistâ€™s collapsing sense of self. Synthetic vocal layers and monologues reveal an identity constantly dissolving and reforming in abstraction. The film explores the brutal erosion of human presence, where technological promise fails to stabilize consciousness, leaving only fleeting fragments of a once-coherent existence.
response.title: Princess
